definition: to record on a CD or DVD/to burn a disc
quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals

sentences.english: How much hard disk space do I need to burn a disc?
sentences.chinese: 刻录一张光盘需要多大的硬盘空间？

sentences.english: The combustor is of the vaporiser type, and hence is equipped with three preheat burners.
sentences.chinese: 燃烧室是汽化器的类型，因此是有三个预热刻录机。

sentences.english: You are recording as it is recorded on a gramophone plate.
sentences.chinese: 你在做记录，就像歌曲被刻录在留声机的唱片上。

sentences.english: A CD burner and a blank CD.
sentences.chinese: 一个CD刻录机和一张空白的CD。

sentences.english: ASML provides lithography systems for the semiconductor industry.
sentences.chinese: 阿斯麦公司主要为半导体行业提供刻录系统。

sentences.english: Please wait while the audio CD tracks are extracted and then burned to CD.
sentences.chinese: 正在读取取光盘然后刻录到光盘中，请等待。

sentences.english: Then you can install CATIA using the CDs.
sentences.chinese: 如果刻录安装嫌麻烦，也可以用虚拟光驱来安装。

sentences.english: Cannot verify that the Rescue Disk has been correctly burned.
sentences.chinese: 不能确定应急盘是否刻录成功。

sentences.english: After the download was completed, I went home and burned the ISO image to a CD.
sentences.chinese: 下载完成后，我就回家把ISO刻录成CD。

sentences.english: The laser process does not require artwork, reducing misregistration issues.
sentences.chinese: 激光刻录不需要工艺图纸，减少登记出错。

sentences.english: The process of burning a CD is simpler now than in the past.
sentences.chinese: 现在刻录光盘的过程比过去简单多了。

sentences.english: These are so that you can burn Ubuntu to a disk in order to install it.
sentences.chinese: 是为了便于你刻录一张Ubuntu的安装盘。

sentences.english: It's probably a good idea to check an image before burning.
sentences.chinese: 在进行刻录之前校验映像文件是一种好的做法。

sentences.english: Do I need an external Blu-ray burner/drive?
sentences.chinese: 我是否需要外接蓝光刻录机或驱动器？

sentences.english: Connect the recorder to your computer.
sentences.chinese: 把刻录机连接到电脑上。

definition: compact disc/CD or DVD/CD ROM/CL:片[pian4],張|张[zhang1]
CD or DVD Drive/abbr. for 光盤驅動器|光盘驱动器
to engrave a seal/stamp mark/to print with carved type/to leave a deep impression
Blu-ray disk, Sony high definition DVD disk
sound track/track number (e.g. on a CD)
USB flash drive/see also 閃存盤|闪存盘[shan3 cun2 pan2]
